name: For 'Babylon 5' Fans Trivia Game | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the name of the first man who was in charge of the station?
questions.explanation:
Sinclair.

	Then he was sent off to become the Earth's ambassador to Minbari.

Delenn.

	Ivanova was a lesbian but also had feelings for {Marcus;} Tasha Yar was the first security chief of the USS Enterprise on 'Star Trek: The Next Generation.'

questions.text: Londo dreamed that somebody would one day kill him; who did he dream of?
questions.explanation:
G'Kar.

	And they killed each other when they were old!

the last, best hope.

	Said in the opening credits.

questions.text: Which former 'Star Trek' actor played Alfred Bester?
questions.explanation:
Walter Koenig.

	After he did his last 'Star Trek appearance' (that I know of), JMS asked him to be the sinister Alfred Bester of the Psi Corps.

questions.correct: he gave Ivanova his life energy
questions.explanation:
he gave Ivanova his life energy.

	That was so sad!

questions.text: Did Dr. Franklin ever get married?
questions.explanation:
no.

	Poor ol' doc. He did go on frequent visits to Garibaldi on Mars, though.

questions.text: Towards the end of the series, Lyta left with whom?
Did Garibaldi ever have any children?
